casebody.data:
No. 15,

Original.

Illinois v. Michigan et al. Paul L. Adams, Attorney General, Samuel J. Torina, Solicitor General, and Nicholas V. Olds, Assistant Attorney General, for the State of Michigan; Mark McElroy, Attorney General, and Harold Read, First Aésistant Attorney General, for the State of Ohio; and Anne X. Alpern, Attorney General, and Lois G. Forer, Deputy Attorney General, for the' State of Pennsylvania, movants. Latham Castle, Attorney General of Illinois, William C. Wines, Assistant Attorney General, and George E. Billett, Charles A. Bane and Calvin D. Trowbridge, Special' Assistant Attorneys General, for complainant.

The motion of the States, of Michigan, Ohio and Pennsylvania for an extension of time to answer the motion for leave to file the complaint is granted and the time is extended to and including March 31, 1959.
